text: Allah aâ€Œtmagulo grahana karena tadera mrtyura samaye, ara yara mare na tadera ghumera madhye, tarapara tini rekhe dena tadera ksetre yadera upare mrtyu abadharita karechena, ara an'yagulo pherata pathana ekati nirdharita kala paryanta. Nihsandeha ete to nidarsanabali rayeche se'i lokadera jan'ya yara cinta kare.
